posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tom Botticelli
Hello All,

I have decent T206 Cobb with the green portrait for sale or trade.  The card is in exceptional condition for the grade.  The card is slightly offset top to bottom.  I am looking for around $1650 in value.  Shipping and insurance can be discussed.  If interested, please contact me at tbotticell@aol.com.
